provenance_text:
John Kane [1860-1934], until 1934; Maggie Halloran Kane, his widow; Mercy Hospital, Pittsburgh, PA; Mount Mercy Academy, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1936; G. David Thompson [1899-1965], Pittsburgh, PA; Harold Diamond, New York, NY by October 1966 [1]; Paul J. Winschel, Pittsburgh, PA, by 1971; Bequest to Museum, in 1971.

Notes:
[1]. Harold Diamonf Inc. lent the painting (no. 78, illustrated in the catalogue) to "Hicks Kane Pippin" exhibition October 1966 - February 1967.
